name: SmartNotify
0:
”Alexa open smart notify”
”alexa ask smartnotify if my train on time”
”alexa ask smartnotify if there is an earthquake”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart notify
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to our preview of SmartNotify.us on Alexa. At this time, using this skill will alert you of specific SNCF train delays and also of recent earthquake activities.

We are limiting this skill by design at this time. By February you will be able to link you Amazon account to your SmartNotify account to decide which information and news can make its way through Alexa.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
